videos.description: Jarrett Allen catches the lob and throws down a punishing jam on Luka Garza.

videos.headline: Jarrett Allen absolutely posterizes Luka Garza

videos.description: Jarrett Allen rises to block Josh Jackson's shot.

videos.headline: Josh Jackson Eurosteps to the hoop for a basket

videos.description: Darius Garland tosses the ball behind his head to Evan Mobley for the alley-oop slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Darius Garland makes beautiful pass for a basket) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Garland flicks no-look lob to Mobley for an alley-oop

videos.description: Darius Garland makes a beautiful dime to Evan Mobley for an alley-oop.

videos.headline: Garland and Mobley connect for another alley-oop

videos.description: Dean Wade gets the steal and passes it off to Isaac Okoro for the dunk.

videos.headline: Wade's defense sets up Okoro's slam

videos.description: Cedi Osman scores a nice bucket against the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nice bucket from Cedi Osman in from Cleveland Cavaliers vs. Detroit Pistons) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Osman evades block and scores tough up-and-under bucket
